articles.description: The electrified version of the Creta is set to enter into production by the end of this year. Ahead of this, the model was spied doing test runs in a production-ready shape.
articles.content:
• Production to begin by the end of 2024
  • Likely to offer a driving range of up to 500km
The Hyundai Creta, without a doubt, is a very popular model by the Korean automaker in I… [+1631 chars]

articles.title: Video: Strong Winds Push American Airlines Plane Away From Gate - NDTV
articles.description: According to the airline representative, maintenance personnel are "currently conducting thorough inspections and will make any needed repairs."
articles.content:
There was nobody on the airplane.

articles.author: Abhinav Ranjan
articles.title: Vodafone Idea Share: 'Ye Bhaav Jarur Aayega' - Sanjiv Bhasin's big bet on Vi stock - ET Now
articles.description: Vodafine Idea Share Price: Ace investor Sanjiv Bhasin has advised ET NOW viewers not to sell Vodafone Idea shares. He said that Vi is on path to become EBITDA positive.
articles.content: Sanjiv Bhasin has exuded confidence that Vodafone Idea will do well and its shares will soon touch Rs 22-mark. (Pic: ET NOW)
